Kindle Oasis E-reader with Leather Charg.text: Very lightweight and portable with excellent battery life.
I like this so much more than the Voyage. The shape makes for easier holding. I only wish this devise was maybe 2 inches taller then it would look like a real book

Replacing older reader without a light and traveling overseas soon. With electronics in the cabin under scrutiny, this very small and very lightweight reader fits the bill! Perfect in small purses and large pockets. I can read without annoying seatmate with cabin overhead seat light. Easy to hold in either hand and screen adjusts for whichever direction you're holding it.

I purchased the Kindle Oasis because I was growing increasingly tired of the glare and cumbersome size of reading off my iPad. So the portability is great. And of course, I went for the most expensive, because I wanted the extra battery life. And while the length of time it stays charged is nice, charges very quickly, it's still overpriced. I love the non-glare screen, you can literally read this anywhere. But the wifi connectivity is patchy at best. I have to go upstairs in my home and stand close to the router for the Oasis to connect, this is very annoying. Wouldn't be a big deal if I only read from this one device. But I read from another and picking up where I left off is a pain most times. Non of my issues are really a big deal, but for $300 I don't feel like I should have any issues.

This is not an upgrade by any means! My three year old kindle outperformed Oasis.Battery life better than a week with the lights on lowest setting Magnetic connector is poorly designed and grows weak Two pieces to keep up with; unsnaps constantly Amazon Customer Services promises it will resolved in an update

This is my first e-reader. I didn't know about the odd refresh and it took a little while to get used to but I do love how small and light it is and that I do not have to remember to plug it in everyday

## Product Recommendation Guide: Kindle Oasis E-reader (Merlot)
## Overview
Customer sentiment is overwhelmingly positive according to the provided data. A significant 87% of reviews are positive, with the remaining 13% containing neutral or negative feedback and expressing specific concerns.
## What Customers Love
Customers frequently highlight the device's design and portability as key strengths. A 5.0/5 review noted its convenience, stating it is Very lightweight and portable with excellent battery life. Another 5.0/5 reviewer specifically praised the ergonomic shape, saying, The shape makes for easier holding, and expressed a clear preference over other models, stating they like this so much more than the Voyage.
## Common Concerns
While generally well-received, some concerns were raised by customers. One customer (4.0/5) who purchased the device to move away from the glare and cumbersome size of reading off my iPad noted that the portability is g..., suggesting the experience might not have fully met their expectations compared to their previous device. A more critical 1.0/5 review expressed disappointment, feeling it was not an upgrade by any means and that a three year old kindle outperformed Oasis, specifically raising concerns about battery performance, mentioning Battery life better than a week with the lights on lowest setting...
## Bottom Line
Based on the available customer reviews, the Kindle Oasis E-reader with Leather Charging Cover (Merlot) appears to be a highly-rated choice for readers who prioritize a lightweight, portable, and ergonomically designed e-reader. Customers who value the unique shape for comfortable holding and ease of transport rated it very positively, with some also praising excellent battery life. However, potential buyers should be aware that experiences with battery life may vary, as one negative review found it disappointing compared to an older model, and that the degree to which it solves issues like glare or cumbersome size might depend on your previous device, as suggested by one reviewer switching from an iPad. It is likely best suited for those who appreciate premium, ergonomic design and portability.
